name: zheroen
text: I, too, would choose "How to Weep the Weepy-Weep Way" over the other titles.

name: juancarlos
text:
I never really got the thinking behind those titles, is it that gay people would know too crazy and stupid titles are really gay porn?
Yet, "I'll hit you with a rock, I'll do what I have to do" made it a five.

name: wehavemagnums
text:
"I'll hit you with a rock, I'll do what I have to do"

Hell yes

name: luckypyjamas
text:
perhaps combined with an "arrr, me hates ye"

i still haven't gotten over that

name: gunsofray
text: Pirates?

name: luckypyjamas
text: pirates seem like good material for gay porn. looking at this a year later i can't really follow this discussion

name: gunsofray
text:
Pirate-themed gay porn .. Like .. Gay porn for children who like pirates?
"plundering the booty" now has a new meaning.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
i'm not entirely comfortable with this idea, just generally all around.. kudos for "plundering the booty"

i believe phillipe has already been exposed to gay porn and come out unscathed (more or less) so hey, i guess i don't see the harm

name: gunsofray
text: That chubby gave me a warm feeling inside. And i'm pretty sure Phillipe could be exposed to most things and be okay, such as the time he saw some horribly-burned people whilst searching for his sofa, or whenever he speaks to Lie Bot about anything

name: dusty
text: If he's okay it's because he doesn't hold onto stuff, if you tell him there's a skeleton in the closet and he believes you he doesn't have nightmares about it for years, he falls to his knees and screams for eight seconds straight. Gets it all out in one go.

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text: You know that's definitely a funny line, but I also got some humor out of two people in a row deciding to add another "do" to the end of it.

name: slalvation
text: I think the idea was that it would be a secret imparted to all homosexuals, that certain DVDs were gay porn in disguise.

name: cracker
text: They would most likely hear about it in the secret gay newsletters or at the gay cabals.

name: rockstarsatemy
text: My mother is always asking me questions about celebrities' sexualities and such, as if the cabal faxes me a monthly report.

name: i_love_kate
text: Ate your what?

name: johnnyrocker
text:
She probably assumes two things:

1. You have gay-dar.
2. Gay-dar can work through magazines or televisions.

name: dusty
text: With all the experimenting you're always hearing about you would think the facts would be more concrete. What are they working on if they haven't even established measures of the range and falloff accuracy of gay-dar?

name: belgand
text: They're still trying to perfect gay-nar for use while snorkeling. It's not nearly accurate enough at present and very crucial if the overall plan is to ever succeed.

name: cailetshadow
text:
The dolphins originally trained for this purpose showed promising results, but when released into Soviet waters on their first mission, immediately deserted and never returned.

To this day we still lack critical data about how gay Soviet Russia was.

name: thescrivener
text: I think the idea was that the secret gay intel network would spread the names of the titles.  I'm imagining secret fake name to real name translation books, possibly decoder rings.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i too would have to know what that is.

name: anabanananana
text: Did anyone else take this as yet another case for Teodor's possible interest in both sexes?  That he was somehow drawn to the disguised gay porn titles?

name: deusoma
text: Nope. I took it as catastrophic failure of Ray's concept.

name: greenkoolayd
text: it is because you are a homosexual.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: A-BLOO BLOO BLOO!

name: magnolia
text: The "Zoinks!" in the corner is especially enticing.

name: spinynorman
text:
It's as if it is saying, "Holy shit, gang! Check out this guy bawling like fuck all!"

At least that's what I got from "zoinks"

name: mortshire
text: if that dvd were real, it would be such a wacky time.

name: william
text: I can't believe they picked Paul Castorzano for that video, he is a complete has-been on the national weeping scene.  I've dropped deuces that could outweep that sucker.

name: senseihollywood
text:
everything I needed to know about weeping I learned from Ray...

[IMGS OFF]

name: ricnine
text: If I could, I would give this comment 5/5.

name: tagrineth
text: Finally, a Ray blubbering comment that is actually appropriate to the strip it's used on.

text: Scanning your profile and your comments... I think you're fake. It doesn't add up, its too gay .

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by Sargasm, davidadam, mrn)

name: hollis
text: You know how Onstad never lets photos of himself get out in the media?  What if you guys met and he actually was really ugly?  (Not saying he is, it's just a possibility.)  Then would you still be trying to convince yourself that he is gay?

text: Damn, that is too funny.

name: jollysaintpete
text: How do you suck so hard, achilles. How

text: Infinite lames for "I thought you guys liked being a flamboyant minority."

text:
This was linked to.

Onstad is wearing Pat's hat...
THAT was probably what was referred to.

name: flynn
text: This title in particular went 361 degrees around and became incredibly intriguing again.

name: arcibi
text:
I would have to check out How to Weep the Weepy-Weep Way almost on principle

Like Teodor, I would have to know what that is

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, silver_lake, nutmeg)

name: catachresis
text: Damn, reading it back, that looks like the Achewood-speak version of massive homophobia. I'm not having a good night.

name: whuppins
text: Ray lives in a world where Braveheart and Top Gun are the only movies anyone ever wants to watch.

name: nutmeg
text: and Mad Max at times in moods

name: soticoto
text: Ray made the brutal mistake of putting How to Weep the Weepy-Weep Way in a situation where it was the most heterosexual-looking film on the shelf.

name: zefiel
text: Curiously, Top Gun can be pretty gay, too.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sarmatron, telegramsiam, Doc_Rostov)

text: ..ious.

text: I'm with Teodor - if I saw "Poems from the Pewter House" I'd have to rent it.

name: ssddr
text: The man on that cover looks like he could teach us all a lot about weeping.

name: joeyramoney
text: that looks like jeff morrow from the weather channel.

name: deancain29
text: A nearby town?

name: twohundredninety
text: I love Ray's loupe in panels 2 and 3.

name: spinynorman
text: Who the fuck is that guy on the cover, I cannot look at him without laughing

name: mountaindewtab
text: pick either braveheart or top gun.  I'll hit you with a rock!

name: ricnine
text: "I'll hit you with a rock" is perfect. I have been known to say this. thanks, Achewood.

name: dallovich
text: Pretty sure that the gay guys would go for Top Gun!

name: luckypyjamas
text: Pat's excuse is pretty transparent, anyways

name: nabeel84
text: My first Achewood, after Time mentioned them. Good stuff.

name: soticoto
text:
Given how gay Braveheart and Top Gun both are (especially the latter)... I'd say Ray should have put Commando on the shelf instead. Now THAT is a heterosexual man's film.

"Let off some steam, Bennett!"

name: echidnaboy
text: I suggest you re-view Arnie's back catalogue, paying close attention to the homoerotic subtext surtext in virtually all of his movies. I suggest this.

name: echidnaboy
text:
The BBCode in that comment didn't quite go according to plan...

subtext surtext

name: soticoto
text: Well, if you think muscled men shooting other muscled men with guns is automatically homoerotic subtext surtext ... then that doesn't really leave much behind, does it?

name: cherubrocker22
text: I'm pretty sure you're not supposed to yell at the focus group when they don't give you the results you want.

name: fosters
text: Ray is a stranger to the scientific method.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Onstad: Bacon No. 1: Going Low.

"Father's bacon didn't really need the bread or lettuce, as it turned out, because the bacon itself essentially turns off everything but one's caveman brain, and you go into a pretty excellent trance until it's gone (at which point you become furious and want to fuck something)."

name: fineoakstructure
text:
That pretty much sums up eating bacon:

Priorities

1. Eat bacon
2. Find more bacon and eat that, too.
3. Fuck something ANYTHING maybe bacon?
4. No, just keep eating the bacon.

name: st_elmos_fire
text: I do believe that I would share Teodor's viewpoint, only moreso that I would have to check out the other dvds too, something so horrible looking that I'd have to get it, and then be rather disappointed when I play it and it's just two dudes boning

name: dasilodavi
text: Ray does not understand the purpose of a focus group.

name: indoorsman
text: Is ray wearing a jeweller's eyeglass thing in panels 2 and 3? He wasn't kidding when he said "all the elements are perfectly balanced..."

name: cygnusx-1
text: Notice in panel 3 that Pat is stuffing something into his vest there. 5'd because that can only mean there is no town meaning and that Pat is about to take a trip to Palmdale.

name: cygnusx-1
text:
...meeting.

Forgive, I'm still waking up.

name: cygnusx-1
text:
Holy shit I just read a few comics ahead.

Mind = blown.
